title: client bug
body: when my computer date reaches the 28 08 2017 when i go to log in the client it says cant connect to server fixed it by change date to before the 28 08 2017 but it getting really anoying having to set my date before the 28 08 2017 all the time

replies.body:
This sounds like a strange case, and disabling your OS clock sync might cause other issues both in-game and your operating system.  Try our configuring DNS step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to see if that helps.

If the issue continues, reach out to our tech team with as much detail as possible via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll work with you directly to see how we can help!
